title: Episode 300: Dinner
description: On the 300th episode of ﻿Eat Your Words﻿, host Cathy Erway is joined in the studio by Melissa Clark, a food writer, cookbook author and staff reporter for the New York Times Food section, where she writes the popular column “A Good Appetite” and appears in a weekly cooking video series. Melissa has written thirty-eight cookbooks, including her latest, Dinner: Changing the Game, to be published by Clarkson Potter in March 2017. Her work has been honored with awards by the James Beard Foundation and IACP (International Association of Culinary Professionals), and has been selected for the Best Food Writing series.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
